mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT unq, title, content, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, decode(status,'N','답변대기','답변완료') status, writer_nik, seller_nik FROM REPORT_BOARD WHERE WRITER=#{writer} ORDER BY unq DESC ) a ) b WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{endIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT_BOARD WHERE WRITER=#{writer}
SELECT unq, title, content, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') udate, seller, seller_nik, writer, writer_nik, re_content FROM REPORT_BOARD WHERE unq = #{unq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT_BOARD ( unq, title, content, rdate, udate, writer, writer_nik, seller, seller_nik) VALUES ( REPORT_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, #{writer}, #{writerNik}, #{seller}, #{sellerNik})
mapper.select: SELECT TITLE, SELLER, (SELECT NIK_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID=SELLER) SELLER_NIK FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_CODE = #{proCode}
SELECT NIK_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
